XXacatstvu:1_1: / sa sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanṃaṇḍalānugataḥ kāyo dharmasvabhāvagatiṃgatatvān manomaya ity ucyate /
XXacatstvu:2_0: yadā cittaṃ manaś cāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
XXacatstvu:2_1: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmiṃ ca //
XXacatstvu:3_0_0: iti vacanāt / niraupamyo bhagavāṃs / tathā sa sarvaśaś cittamanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāpagato 'navagṛhīta ākāśasamo 'bhyavakāśaprakṛtito
XXacatstvu:3_1_0: tatra bhavanto jinaputrāḥ evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhād acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmer gaṃbhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāram
XXacatstvu:3_1_1: anuprāpto bhavati durājñānam asaṃbhinnaṃ sarvanimittāpagatam ityādivacanān niḥsvabhavārthavedī /
XXacatstvu:3_2_0: sa evaṃ kṣāntipratilabdho bodhisattvo yatra yatropasaṃkrāmati kṣatriyabrāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdradevabrahmapariṣadaṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇītīrthikamāraparṣadaṃ
XXacatstvu:3_2_1: [Css_239] sarvatrātīto niḥśaṅkam upasaṃkrāmati viśārada eva pravyāharati /
XXacatstvu:3_3: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sa hy anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt sarvadharmānutpādākāreṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ pratividdhavāstu .
XXacatstvu:3_4: . mād asya aparajñānakṛtaṃ kleśakṛtaṃ ca parṣacchāradyaṃ nāstīti vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ anabhilāpyānabhilāpyakalpāyuḥpramāṇādhiṣṭhānatayā sa āyurvaśitāṃ labhate /
XXacatstvu:3_14: ity evaṃ daśavaśitāprāpto yas tvaṃ dṛṣṭivipannasya lokasyāsya hitodyata ity anena ca praśastapratipattir ameyatvam acittatā coktā /
XXacatstvu:3_15: vakṣyamāneṣv api sarveṣu pratyekam arthatrayaṃ yojyam /
XXacatstvu:3_18_0: tatra dharmāś caturvidhā vipaśyanādharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanādayaḥ bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ smṛtyupasthānādayaḥ buddhadharmā daśabalavaiśāradyādayaḥ
XXacatstvu:3_20: tatra bauddhaṃ cakṣur dhyānābhisaṃskāranirvṛttam abhijñāsaṃgṛhītam aṣṭāvidhaparikarmalabhyatvāt kumārabhuvaḥ /
XXacatstvu:5_0: iti / tenāpi cakṣuṣā tvayā na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhāvyate prāg evetaraiḥ /
XXacatstvu:5_1: pañcānām api cakṣuṣām anavabhāsagamanatvāt tattvārthasya dṛṣṭijñānam /
XXacatstvu:5_3: nanu pratilabdhaprathamādibhuvo 'pi āryā na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhante tat ko 'syātiśaya ity āha /
XXacatstvu:5_4: anuttarā ceti / yasmān nātra tattvārthadarśanād vyutthito bhavati /
XXacatstvu:5_5: pūrvakās tu sapta vihārā vyāmiśrā ayam ekāntaśuddhaḥ /
XXacatstvu:5_6: yathoktaṃ / yadā punaḥ sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmer aṣṭamīṃ bhūmim avakrānto bhavati tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānam abhirūhya ityādi /
XXacatstvu:5_7: tasmād eva gambhīrāṇāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ nānyo 'smād adhiko gaṃbhīro ity atrānuttarety ucyate /
XXacatstvu:5_8: / pravicayo lakṣaṇataḥ kṛtyato hetutaḥ phalataḥ saṃkhyāta āsvādata ādīnavato niḥsaraṇataś ca kleśato vyavadānataḥ parijñātaḥ prahāṇataḥ sākṣātkaraṇato bhāvanātaś ca /
XXacatstvu:5_10: arthaviśeṣeṇa / arthadvayasaṃgrahenaikaḥ tathaivānyaḥ ekenaiko dvābhyām aparaḥ
XXacatstvu:7_0: ityādivacanāt / bhāvanārthena punar ekaḥ / tatrārūpavad ity ākāśavat / tathā coktaṃ yāvat tathāgatavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatakāyavarṇarūpam ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:7_1: iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetraprasareṣu sattvānām upapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarās teṣu teṣu tathāgataḥ svakāyavibhaktim ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:7_3: tac cāsya kāyasaṃdarśanam akṣūṇam avandhyaṃ ca sarvasattvaparipākavinayāyetyādi /
XXacatstvu:7_5: tathā hi saptamyāṃ bhūmau buddhakāyavyūhaṃ jānāti na tu tadā niṣpādayituṃ śaknoti /
XXacatstvu:7_6: buddhakāyavyūhajñānāt tu tasyāṃ bhūmau niṣpādanecchāṃ jānāti /
XXacatstvu:7_9: etasyā eva kṣānteḥ sahapratilambhād yāny asya sugatidurgativipākyāni karmāvaraṇāni tāny asya samucchinnāni bhavanti /
XXacatstvu:7_10: anyatra [Css_242] tathāgatānām anāgatajanatānukampadarśanād ata etadvibhāge ślokaḥ /
XXacatstvu:7_13: vākkāyanirdeśatas trayaḥ // tatrotpādavigamān nityo nirodhavigamād dhruvaḥ śivo dvayābhāvāt /
XXacatstvu:7_18: sarveṣv apy avasthitārthatrayopasaṃhāradvāreṇā bhagavato guṇānāṃ kīrtanena prasūtapuṇyasyāsyāṃ bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya pariṇāmanārthenaika uktaḥ /
XXacatstvu:7_19: tatra praśastagamanād punarāvṛttyā ca sugataḥ atarkyatvād alāpyatvād āryajñānād acintyatety acintyaḥ aprameyaṃ aprameyāśrayaparāvṛttyā vibhutvalābhāt /
XXacatstvu:7_20: tathā hy asyāṃ bhūmau nirantamahābodhisamudāgamaprayogasamādhiṣu vyavasthito bodhisattvo
XXacatstvu:10_2: svābhāvikī syād yadi vastusiddhir udīrṇadīpetaraśāntisiddhivat tadā sarvakleśamaheśvarasya carato mohasya śāntiḥ katham /
XXacatstvu:11_0: pratītyajānāṃ bhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ jagādaya ityādy āha /
XXacatstvu:11_2_0: [Css_243] iha bodhisattvas tenāpi vihāreṇa gaṃbhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviseṣatām anugacchan yaiś ca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ
XXacatstvu:11_2_1: pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo yac ca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXacatstvu:11_4_0: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante yena ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante yac ca saṃkleṣavyavadānaṃ yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā
XXacatstvu:11_5: evaṃ ca deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharmabhāṇakatvam ityādi yathāsūtram eva vistarato veditavyam /
XXacatstvu:11_6: asamajñānam iti daśamyāṃ tathāgatakṛtyenāvasthitatvād yathoktam āryadaśabhūmake /
XXacatstvu:11_7: yāvad daśānāṃ samādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇāṃ paryante sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavān nāma bodhisattvasamādhir āmukhībhavatītyādi /
XXacatstvu:12_1: na punaḥ kurute yatnaṃ paripākāya dehinām // 1
XXacatstvu:12_2: yo yathā yena vaineyo manyate 'sau tathaiva ca /
XXacatstvu:12_8: athā cāṇoḥ pṛthivyāś ca goṣpadasyodādheś ca yat /
XXacatstvu:12_9: antaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhasya ca tad antaram // 5
XXacatstvu:13_1: acintyam iti yathoktaṃ sa khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattva evam imāṃ bhūmim anugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate 'nāvaraṇaṃ cetyādi /
XXacatstvu:13_3: piṇḍiteṣu rajāṃsi yāvanti guṇā daśamyāṃ bhavanti tāvanta ihāsya tāvad ity anidarśanam uktaṃ bhagavatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmivyavasthitabodhisattvaguṇanirdeśe /
XXacatstvu:13_5: tad yathā śūnyatālakṣaṇam animittalakṣaṇam apraṇihitalakṣaṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ paratantralakṣaṇaṃ ca /
XXacatstvu:13_6: tatra ṣadbhiḥ ṣadbhis tribhir deśanākṛtyārthabhedena yathākramaṃ trīṇi lakṣaṇāny uktāni /
XXacatstvu:13_7: ekenaiṣām eva trayāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ ṣadbhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhiś ca śeṣāniboddhavyāni /
XXacatstvu:13_8_0: iti māyādidṛṣṭāntair ityādi saptabhiḥ ślokair yathākramaṃ guṇakathanamukhena sarveṣām upasaṃhāraḥ kām apy acintyāṃ paramagambhirāvasthāṃ
XXacatstvu:13_8_1: prāptatvād asya vihārasyeti bhavaddṛśā eva bhavantaṃ janayantīti pratipādanāyaikaḥ /
XXacatstvu:13_9: / asyām eva bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya puṇyapariṇāmanam ity anyaḥ /
XXacatstvu:15_2: phalāvasthām ārabhya sarva evānāśravā dharmāḥ sarvaprakārām anuttarāṃ viśuddhim upagatavantaḥ saṃbuddhākhyāṃ pratilabhante /
XXacatstvu:15_3: teṣāṃ hetvavasthāyām eva tāvad aśūnyatā prāg eva phalāvasthāyām ity āha /
XXacatstvu:15_5: anutpannam anālayam iti anutpannasvabhāvenetyāder yāvad gambhīrāya namo 'stu ta ity etadantasya sūcanam /
XXacatstvu:15_7: tayor atīto gocaro yena / tathā coktam acintyam anidarśanam iti /
XXacatstvu:15_9: abhimukhyāḥ prabhṛti viśeṣataḥ pratilabdhānām anutpādādīnāṃ niratiśayārthena pañca tasyāḥ prabhṛti nirodhalābhād āvaraṇadvayavāsanāśeṣasyāpy abhāvāt paramagāmbhīryārthenaikaḥ /
XXacatstvu:15_10: evaṃ stute stuto bhūyāḥ saṃvṛtyeti śeṣaḥ athavā kiṃ bata stutaḥ paramārthena /
XXacatstvu:15_13: idānīṃ saṃvṛtyāpi stuter asaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayann āha /
XXacatstvu:15_17: grāhakagrāhyanirmukto bhagavān sa ca grāhake grāhye ca caratīti /
XXacatstvu:15_19: acintyapratītyasamutpādadharmatayā saty advaye 'pi prakṛter abhāvād iti /
XXacatstvu:15_20: / svabhāvapariśuddhyadhimuktyāpi vastuno [Css_246] 'nupalambliena pravṛttas tu mahāphala iti /
XXacatstvu:15_23: / etāvantam evārtham adhikṛtyābhisamayakramaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣu vistareṇokto boddhavyaḥ /
